info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 6:18PM MST until July 15 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Tucson AZ
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, central Pima.
* WHEN...Until 815 PM MST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 618 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Blanco Wash, Moras Wash, Las, San Juan Wash, Bailey Wash, Fresno Wash, Sil Nakya Wash, Bolas Blancas Wash, Seco, Arroyo, Ko Vaya Wash, Placeritos Wash, Cerro Prieto Wash, Mendoza Wash, Murk Kui Wash, Chukut Kuk Wash, Legunita Wash, Soto Wash, Sabino Wash, Sasabe, Arroyo del, Topawa Wash, Vamori Wash, Viopuli Wash, San Luis Wash, Pan Wash, South Mendoza Wash, Sikul Himatk Wash, Contreras Wash, Arivaca Creek, Baboquivari Wash, Santa Margarita Wash, Comobabi Wash, Peitas Wash, Compartidero, Arroyo del, Fresnal Wash, Banner Wash, Anegan Wash, Puertocito Wash, Sells Wash, Altar Wash, Brawley Wash, Aguirre Wash, San Vicente Wash, Alambre Wash, Pan Tak Wash, Little Thomas Wash, Thomas Canyon Wash, Osa Wash, La, Mulberry Wash, Lopez Wash, Ali Molina Wash, Saucito Wash, Brown Wash, Guijas Wash, Las, Chutum Vaya Wash and Solano Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sells, Three Points, Topawa, San Miguel, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Ali Chukson, Vamori, South Komelik, Fresnal, San Pedro, Choulic, Newfield, Queens Well, Coldfields, South Comobabi, Comobabi, Cababi, Santa Rosa Ranch and Fresnal Canyon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST THIS EVENING
